newsitem.title: FRANCE: French logistics/freight forum for March 18-21.
newsitem.headline: French logistics/freight forum for March 18-21.

text.p: The Semaine Internationale du Transport et de la Logistique (SITL), an annual international freight transport and logistics conference will take place at the Parc des Expositions de Paris-Nord Villepinte exhibition centre, in the northern suburbs of Paris, between March 18-21 1997.

"Air cargo" industry participants include Air France Cargo, CAE Cargo Internatonal, Euralair, express distribution operators, Chronopost, DHL Worldwide Express, Jet Services, TAT Express and UPS, the airports of Barcelona, Brest, Bordeaux, Chateauroux, Europort-Vatry, Lyon-Satolas, Marseille, forwarding groups, Danzas and Jules Roy and freight centre operator, Sogaris.
France's deputy Transport minister, Anne-Marie Idrac, is scheduled to speak on European transport policy and the environment. --Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542 7706 Fax:5017
